books.description: The author of “Fire and Fury” and “Siege” portrays events during the final days of Trump’s presidency. Read by Holter Graham. 11 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.
books.title: LANDSLIDE

books.author: Michael Pollan
books.description: A look at arbitrary beliefs surrounding opium, caffeine and mescaline, which are derived from plants. Read by the author. 7 hours, 37 mintues unabridged.
books.title: THIS IS YOUR MIND ON PLANTS

books.author: Steven Rinella
books.description: A collection of outdoor adventures and dangerous encounters. Read by the author and other contributors. 5 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MEATEATER'S CAMPFIRE STORIES: CLOSE CALLS

books.author: Michael C. Bender
books.description: A senior White House reporter for The Wall Street Journal looks at Trump’s 2020 campaign and final year in office. Read by Eric Pollins. 17 hours, 6 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FRANKLY, WE DID WIN THIS ELECTION

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Ben Shapiro
books.description: The conservative commentator depicts what he perceives as threats to American business, education and politics. Read by the author. 6 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE AUTHORITARIAN MOMENT

books.author: Jesse Watters
books.description: The Fox News host recounts his career and prescribes ways to defend against what he considers left-wing radicalism. Read by Larry Wayne. 9 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: HOW I SAVED THE WORLD

books.author: Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice. Read by the author. 8 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: UNTAMED

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Barack Obama
books.description: In the first volume of his presidential memoirs, Barack Obama offers personal reflections on his formative years and pivotal moments through his first term. Read by the author. 29 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A PROMISED LAND

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: A look at the key players and outcomes of precision bombing during World War II. Read by the author. 5 hours, 14 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BOMBER MAFIA

books.author: Daniel Kahneman, Olivier Sibony and Cass R. Sunstein
books.contributor: by Daniel Kahneman, Olivier Sibony and Cass R. Sunstein
books.title: NOISE

books.author: Sheera Frenkel and Cecilia Kang
books.contributor: by Sheera Frenkel and Cecilia Kang
books.title: AN UGLY TRUTH

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Tim S. Grover with Shari Lesser Wenk
books.contributor: by Tim S. Grover with Shari Lesser Wenk
books.title: WINNING

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
books.title: MOTHERING HEIGHTS

books.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
books.description: A poor young man who was betrayed by someone he once trusted discovers he has the power of a devil inside him.
books.title: CHAINSAW MAN, VOL. 1

books.author: Aaron Blabey
books.description: The 13th book in the Bad Guys series. What lies beyond a mysterious doorway in the grossest restaurant in the world?
books.title: THE BAD GUYS IN CUT TO THE CHASE

books.author: Clint McElroy et al
books.description: The fourth installment of the series that is based on the podcast from the McElroy family. An unknown menace has seized control of a deadly relic.
books.title: THE ADVENTURE ZONE: THE CRYSTAL KINGDOM

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.
books.title: GRIME AND PUNISHMENT

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: Stories within a story come to life as Li'l Petey, Flippy and Molly show baby frogs how to create comics.
books.title: CAT KID COMIC CLUB

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Katy Farina
books.description: The fourth book in the Baby-Sitters Little Sister series. Will Karen and her friends get hired to cat-sit?
books.title: KAREN'S KITTYCAT CLUB

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: As the war against the Paranormal Liberation Front continues, Midoriya senses an ominous presence in the hospital.
books.title: MY HERO ACADEMIA, VOL. 28

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The seventh book in the Dog Man series. A new villain has a bone to pick with Dog Man while Petey the Cat starts a new life.
books.title: FOR WHOM THE BALL ROLLS

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The eighth book in the Dog Man series. Petey the Cat feels better after getting out of jail but Li’l Petey struggles to find good in the world.
books.title: FETCH-22

books.author: Scott Cawthon and Kira Breed-Wrisley.
books.contributor: by Scott Cawthon and Kira Breed-Wrisley. Illustrated by Claudia Aguirre
books.description: The second book in the Five Nights at Freddy’s series. When bodies are found near her school, Charlie is drawn back into the world of her father’s creations.
books.title: THE TWISTED ONES

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Gabriela Epstein
books.description: The ninth book in the Baby-Sitters Club series. Claudia must choose between spending time with the very artistic Ashley or the Baby-sitters Club.
books.title: CLAUDIA AND THE NEW GIRL

books.author: Terri Libenson
books.description: The fifth book in the Emmie & Friends series. Tyler likes nerding out with Emmie but his jock friends give him a hard time about doing so.
books.title: TRULY TYLER

books.author: Hajime Isayama
books.description: A group of survivors must go into hiding to escape the giant humanoids known as the Titans.
books.title: ATTACK ON TITAN, VOL. 1

books.author: Jerry Craft
books.description: Jordan Banks, an artistically inclined seventh grader from Washington Heights, has a tough time navigating an upscale private school where diversity is low and maintaining his neighborhood friendships.
books.title: NEW KID

books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
books.title: A TIME FOR MERCY

books.author: Quentin Tarantino
books.description: A novelization of the film set in 1969, by its director and screenwriter.
books.title: ONCE UPON A TIME IN HOLLYWOOD

books.author: Stephen King
books.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.
books.title: THE INSTITUTE

books.author: Harlan Coben
books.description: When a girl goes missing, a private investigator’s feral childhood becomes an asset in the search.
books.title: THE BOY FROM THE WOODS

books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: Two mystery stories: “Mind Over Matter” and “Lawless.”
books.title: CLOSE TO YOU

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: After a California rancher’s sudden death, his three daughters discover things they did not know about their father.
books.title: DADDY'S GIRLS

books.author: James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.contributor: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Detectives Kylie MacDonald and Zach Jordan search for a reality TV star who goes missing from her wedding reception.
books.title: NYPD RED 6

books.author: Debbie Macomber
books.description: The third book in the Blossom Street series. Susannah returns home to take care of her mother and reflect on choices she made.
books.title: SUSANNAH'S GARDEN

books.author: Stuart Woods
books.description: The 55th book in the Stone Barrington series. A criminal mastermind turns out to be a person of influence.
books.title: SHAKEUP

books.author: Jonathan Kellerman and Jesse Kellerman
books.contributor: by Jonathan Kellerman and Jesse Kellerman
books.description: The third book in the Clay Edison series. The deputy coroner is on the case when a decades-old skeleton of a child is found in a park.
books.title: HALF MOON BAY

books.author: RaeAnne Thayne
books.description: The fifth book in the Women of Brambleberry House series. Dark secrets threaten what is developing between Rosa and Wyatt.
books.title: A BRAMBLEBERRY SUMMER

books.author: James Patterson and Tucker Axum III
books.contributor: by James Patterson and Tucker Axum III
books.description: Cain Lemaire, an ex-Secret Service agent from New Orleans, gets in the thick of things as the head of security for a chief executive in Tokyo.
books.title: CAJUN JUSTICE

books.author: Shari Lapena
books.description: In a quiet suburb, a teenager has been breaking into homes and hacking into computers, while a woman is found murdered.
books.title: SOMEONE WE KNOW

books.author: Lisa Kleypas
books.description: The seventh book in the Ravenels series. Lady Merritt Sterling falls for a Scottish whisky distiller who is in danger.
books.title: DEVIL IN DISGUISE

books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 52nd book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a young sculptor in the West Village.
books.title: FAITHLESS IN DEATH

books.author: Katherine Applegate.
books.contributor: by Katherine Applegate. Illustrated by Patricia Castelao
books.title: THE ONE AND ONLY IVAN

books.title: I AM MALALA

books.author: Rosanne Parry.
books.contributor: by Rosanne Parry. Illustrated by Mónica Armiño
books.title: A WOLF CALLED WANDER

books.author: Adam Silvera
books.title: THEY BOTH DIE AT THE END

books.author: Holly Jackson
books.title: A GOOD GIRL'S GUIDE TO MURDER
